value.name: Santa Monica shooting suspect made prior threats, classmate says
value.description: On Sunday, police released a photo of the suspected gunman in the Santa Monica shooting rampage that left five people dead Friday. Authorities say John Zawahri, 23, fatally shot his father ...

value.name: Santa Monica shooting rampage: Suspect identified as John Zawahri
value.description: Santa Monica police say the suspect in the shooting rampage was "heavily armed and ready for battle" when he stepped onto the Santa Monica College campus. At a Saturday afternoon news conference ...
